title: Infinix Note 11s (Mithril Grey, 64 GB)  (6 GB RAM)

product_specification.In The Box: Handset, Battery, Adaptor, USB Type-C Cable, TPU Case, Protective Screen Guard, SIM Ejector Pin, Quick Start Guide, Warranty Card, Scratch Card
product_specification.Sound Enhancements: Dual Speakers with DTS Surround Sound
product_specification.Other Display Features: 120 Hz Refresh Rate, 180 Hz Sampling Rate, 91% Screen-to-Body Ratio, 20.5:9 Aspect Ratio, LCD LTPS, 480 nits, 1500:1 Color Contrast Ratio, InCell, Eye Care Mode, NEG Dinorex T2X-1 Glass Protection
product_specification.Operating Frequency: 2G GSM: B2/B3/B5/B8, 3G WCDMA: B1/B5/B8, 4G LTE: B1/B3/B5/B8/B38/B40/B41
product_specification.Primary Camera: 50 MP + 2 MP Depth Lens + 2 MP Macro Lens
product_specification.Primary Camera Features: AI Triple Camera Setup: 50 MP (f/1.6 Aperture) + 2 MP Depth Lens + 2 MP Macro Lens, Quad LED Flash, Camera Features : Super Night, Custom Portrait, AI HDR, AI 3D Beauty, Panorama, Document, AR Shots, Pro Mode, Slo-Mo Video, Time Lapse, Short Video, 2K Video Recording with Bokeh
product_specification.Secondary Camera Features: 16 MP AI Camera Setup: (f/2.0 Aperture) with Dual LED Flash, Camera Feature: Super Night, AI Portrait, AI 3D Face Beauty, Wide Selfie, AR Shots, Time Lapse, 2K Video Recording with Bokeh
product_specification.Flash: Rear: Quad LED Flash| Front: Dual LED Flash
product_specification.Sensors: Fingerprint Sensor, Ambient Light, G-Sensor, Proximity, Gyroscope, E-Compass
product_specification.Other Features: TUV Rheinland Certified: Low Blue Light (Software Solution) and Safe Fast Charge System, UFS 2.2 Storage, DAR-LINK 2.0 Game Boost Technology, Dual Speakers with DTS Surround Sound, Power Marathon Tech, Video Assistant, Thunderback, Xhide, Theft Alert, Peek Proof, Kids Mode, Xclone, Photo Compressor, 360 Flashlight, Social Turbo, Wi-Fi Share, Smart Gestures, Digital Wellbeing, Dark Theme, Eye Care, Multi-Window, Bike Mode, Game Mode, Smart Panel, AI Gallery, Side Mounted Fingerprint Unlock, 3-in-1 Card Slot
product_specification.Audio Formats: AAC, AAC+, AAC+ Enhanced, OGG Vorbis, WAV,MP3, MIDI
product_specification.Warranty Summary: 1 Year on Handset and 6 Months on Accessories

product_description.Stunning Visuals: The Note 11S features a 17.65 cm (6.95) screen with an FHD+ display and 91% Screen body ratio so that you can experience clear visuals on an expanded screen. Also, this mobile phone comes with an LTPS LCD display, 480 NITS brightness, 1500:1 Color Contrast Ratio, and 20.5:9 aspect ratio so that you can have an immersive viewing experience.
product_description.120 Hz Smooth display: This mobile phone comes with a 120 Hz refresh rate so that you can have a smooth scrolling experience. Also, with the 180 Hz touch sampling rate, you can enjoy fast screen responsiveness, enhanced gaming, and more. It also releases low blow light emissions to reduce the strain caused on your eyes while using this device for long periods of time.
product_description.Helio G96 Octa-Core Processor: This phone is powered by an Helio G96 Octa-core processor with 12 nm FinFET, 2.05GHz CPU frequency that allows you to experience powerful gaming every time. Also, you can enjoy long hours of powerful gaming without any significant lag, thanks to the Dar-link 2.0 Game Boost Technology. As a result, even while you are gaming for extended hours, your phone will not get heated up. The processor is further supported by UFS2.2. storage and LPDDR4X RAM.
product_description.Linear Motor: This mobile phone comes with a haptic feedback Linear motor so that you can enjoy an interactive life-like gaming experience. Also, the device comes with a super cool system, along with 3D 6-layer graphene films on the back so that you can protect your device from getting heated up during an intense gaming session.
product_description.Lightning-fast Battery: This mobile phone is equipped with a 5000 mAh battery, Power Marathon Technology so that you can stay connected to your device without worrying about the charge running out. As a result, you can enjoy up to 24 hrs of video playback, 158 hrs of music playback, 55 hrs of 4G talk-time, 19 hrs of gaming, and more. Also, this phone comes with a 33 W Fast charger with a USB Type-C cable, so that you can charge your phone even when you are travelling.
product_description.50 MP Wide Aperture Camera: This mobile phone comes with a 50 MP wide aperture AI triple rear camera and Quad-LED Flash so that you can capture stunning looking pictures. This phone also comes with a Super Slow motion feature, Time Lapse videos, Bokeh mode so that you can capture photos according to your preference. Furthermore, this phone features Super Night mode, Short Video, Document mode, and more, so that you can click high-quality pictures under any light. Also, you can enjoy capturing high-quality videos from any angle, thanks to the 2K resolution video feature and 2 MP depth sensor, 2 MP macro lens.
product_description.16 MP In-display selfie: This phone is equipped with a 16 MP AI In-display selfie, f/2.0 aperture and dedicated Dual LED flash to let you capture professional selfies. This mobile phone also features AI Portrait, Super Night Mode, Wide Selfie, 3D Face Beauty mode to further modify the look of your selfies.
product_description.Smudge-proof Design: Note 11S features a frost design that is smudge-proof and fingerprint-proof, thus giving it an elegant look. Moreover, the phone comes with NEG Dinorex T2X-1 Glass Protection durability so that you can protect your phone from scratches and minor drops. Also, the phone comes with Cinematic Dual Speakers along with DTS Surround sound so that you can enjoy high-quality sound.
product_description.Side-mounted Fingerprint: This mobile phone comes with a multi-functional fingerprint sensor that allows you to unlock your phone, dismiss your alarm, and answer calls with just a tap of your finger. Also, this mobile phone feature helps you to synchronise your selected apps with different fingers to jumpstart them accordingly. And, thanks to the face unlock feature, you can unlock your phone almost instantly.
product_description.XOS 10 on Android 11: This mobile phone is powered by an XOS 10 powered Android 11 operating system that delivers a range of exciting features, such as Ultra-touch, Thunderback, Secure Card, Theft Alert, Xhide, Xclone, Video Assistant, and more.

Good choice for this price

I am reviewing this phone after using more than one month. Dispite being around 7 inch size, it doent feel bulky in hand. Its handiness is very good and has very decent looks. One more thing I like about this phone is the battery backup. This 5000mh phone gives more backup than my previous 6000mh samsung galaxy M30s phone. The UI experience is quite rich. Performance is also good never lagged on any day to day tasks. Charging of this phone is super fast. Biometric scans are fast enough. I haven't used camera much, so can't say much about it.

Now the cons part. This phone doesn't come with widewine L1 certification, so Netflix 1080p level vedios are not supperted. Secondary noise cancellation on mic is not provided. And lastly, one particular thing i didn't like about this phone is when calling in handsfree/speeker mode, the audio quality deteriorates. This is a very basic feature and much cheaper phones of every other company provide good audio quality qhile speaking in handsfree mode. Infinix should look into it.
Awesome phone at affordable prize really pleased with the product and team Flipkart thank you guys

When Comparing with infinix note 11 only good point is
1) screen is cool tinted and colour accuracy is good, like any other good lcd, which makes reading on screen pleasing, note 11 suffers from tint issue, so white looks cool to warm.
1.2)And colours are natural, good for some , may not please some.
1.3) reading documents is better compared with amoled.
2) speed is great, no lag at all.
3) had wide wine L1.

Bad points
1) heavy, difficult to use with one hand.
And lowest brightness is not low enough, so at nights if you r using phone, it hurts eyes.
Here also note 11 excels, with lowest brightness setting keeps brightness very low.
2) sound output is lower and not as pleasing as note 11
3) Amoled excels in movie watching and probably in games too, due to extraordinary contrast ratio, which lcd lacks, that said on its own it is ok, but can't match with amoled.
4) big , difficult to use with one hand, but weight is balanced well.
5) not as classy looking as note 11
6) camera has over exposure problem, and suffers heavily from exposure problems, brightness is changed all most every second in video, basically software is bad, and we cannot use third party camera apps to correct that.

Verdict: if you don't bother tint issue of amoled and widevine L1, note 11 is much better than this, for normal users, may be gamers might feel it underpowered, but regular users would be delighted with note 11 compared with 11s, particularly at the present price of 10.5k and who r normal users like me(i mean non gamers).

Built of both phones is great, main reason why I bought them.
